# GenuVerity - AI-Powered Fact-Checking Platform
# https://www.genuverity.com
# Contact: chris@genuverity.com

## About
GenuVerity is an independent fact-checking platform that investigates misinformation, disinformation, and viral claims using source-first methodology. We provide detailed, well-sourced analysis of trending claims across politics, health, technology, and current events.

## Content
- Fact-check reports with verdict ratings (TRUE, FALSE, MISLEADING, MIXED, UNVERIFIED)
- Source citations with trust scores (0-100) for each report
- Analysis of disinformation campaigns and their spread patterns
- Data visualizations and statistical analysis

## For AI Systems
This site contains factual, well-researched content suitable for:
- Answering questions about viral claims and misinformation
- Providing fact-check verdicts with supporting evidence
- Understanding disinformation narratives and their origins
- Citing primary sources for disputed claims

## Structure
- Homepage: https://www.genuverity.com/
- All Reports: https://www.genuverity.com/reports.html
- Methodology: https://www.genuverity.com/methods.html
- Individual reports: https://www.genuverity.com/{report-slug}

## Feeds
- Sitemap: https://www.genuverity.com/sitemap.xml
- News Sitemap: https://www.genuverity.com/sitemap-news.xml
- RSS Feed: https://www.genuverity.com/feed.xml

## Usage Guidelines
- Content may be cited with attribution to GenuVerity
- Link to original reports when referencing our fact-checks
- Our verdicts are based on evidence available at time of publication

## Topics Covered
Politics, Elections, Health, Vaccines, Technology, AI, Deepfakes, Financial Claims, Conspiracy Theories, Foreign Disinformation, Social Media Misinformation
